title: LF Duo partner.
body:
I'm Bronze 3 at 63LP, anyone within the LoL ranked DUO queue restrictions (1 league above/below) and is interested in duoing with me, add me in game and mention that you're interested. We can DUO bot lane or do seperate carry roles. Just don't want any heavy people (i know right, a bronzie saying that, quite a sight! :P) anyway, SgtPuffles is my IGN, or comment here and i'll get back to you.

(mains are ekko, draven, vayne, thresh, volibear, shaco, LeBlanc) but can play most champions very well.

replies.body: I am still in my Provisionals and I normally just play Thresh support. I haven't played top or mid in a while so I might need to play that in normals first before playing with you, if you're interested.
Added you both, I'm on until 3 today, chill day for me! hopefully neither of you are school kids :P

Yo I'm interested, I can do any role pretty well bar jungle, I CAN do jungle but I'm not confident in my ability to be efficient at it. I would also like to get out of bronze as I've spent the last year playing normals to do so. Would love to add on skype and play some matches.

Hi, I'm interested in some Duo Ques. I'm currently in Silver II so I think I'm still in the restriction range. 
I got lucky in my placement so I don't think I belong in the silver II bracket. 

I play top mainly, can play adc/support.

ign: Daveeyg
